title.rendered: 5 day residential training for grassroot NGO’s

content.rendered:
A five day residential training was conducted for grass root NGO’S in Delhi w2hich started on the 29th of November and concluded on the 3rd of December. 27 participants from 18 grass root NGOs from 9 states participated in the event.

The curriculum of this 5 day workshop was scientifically designed which matched international standards and yet is applicable to India’s socio-political scenario. The workshop was conducted by experienced trainers who have been specially trained for the same.
